ComicInfo.Title: Sanglor's Hypnotic Ray; Insect Men of Mercury; The Hag of Blackamoor Forest; The Noxio Gas Plot; The Emperor of Ganymede; The Anti-Solar Ray
ComicInfo.Summary: Sanglor, who has developed a ray that hypnotizes people, takes control of the world's statesmen.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 18:10:49. [Issue ID 832]
